QuestData.Title: A Daughter's Love
QuestData.Description: Here, take this and lay it on his grave. Maybe... somehow, he'll know that I'm okay, and that none of us hold him responsible for what happened.$b$b<There are tears in her eyes now, as she slides a ring from her right hand, and presses it into your hands.>$b$bAnd... thank you, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Sarah Ladimore's ring to Morgan Ladimore's grave.
QuestData.RewardText: <A ghostly voice sounds on the wind...>$b$bThis is...? Sarah? Could it be she's still alive? The weight is removed from my shoulders...$b$b$n. Take my sword, Archeus. As my soul is put to rest, I have no more need for it. It was forged to do good, and though I have proved myself unworthy to hold it, perhaps you will carry on the Light through it.$b$bLys, my love...
